name: hauk
tagline: A self-hosted real time location sharing application using temporary links
description: Hauk is a self-hosted real-time location sharing app. It lets users share live location via temporary links without third-party tracking, suitable for safety or coordination during travel.

features.title: Location Sharing
features.description: Share real-time location using temporary links

features.title: Map View
features.description: View shared locations on an interactive map

features.title: Mobile-Friendly Interface
features.description: Access location sharing from mobile browsers

features.title: No Account Requirement
features.description: Share locations without creating user accounts

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the location sharing service on your own infrastructure
